Text: The Federal Palace (German: "Bundeshaus" , French: "Palais fédéral" , Italian: "Palazzo federale" , Romansh: "Chasa federala" , Latin: "Curia Confœderationis Helveticæ" ) refers to the building in Bern housing the Swiss Federal Assembly (legislature) and the Federal Council (executive).
